title: Potential for the use of large unstructured data resources by public innovation support institutions
research_description: This paper explores how large unstructured data resources can be used by public innovation support institutions to improve R&D management and support systems, focusing on Poland.
research_results: The study demonstrates how big data tools can provide more accurate predictions for R&D activities, reducing reliance on outdated data and enhancing decision-making in public institutions.
future_research: Future research could explore the integration of additional AI-based methods in public sector data analysis and the application of similar approaches in other countries.
